data.phrase:
config case_sensitive = false
| dataset = incidents 
| filter alert_sources = "CORRELATION" and mitre_techniques_id_and_name = "T1566 - Phishing"
| arrayexpand alert_sources
| fields incident_id, creation_time, resolved_ts, assigned_user , alert_sources as Type , status
| filter status  in (ENUM.NEW, ENUM.UNDER_INVESTIGATION ) 
| comp count_distinct(incident_id) as Incidents by assigned_user

| view graph type = pie xaxis = assigned_user yaxis = Incidents

config case_sensitive = false
| dataset = incidents 
| filter alert_sources = "CORRELATION" and mitre_techniques_id_and_name = "T1566 - Phishing"
| alter time_to_assign = timestamp_diff(first_assignment_ts, creation_time, "MINUTE")
| fields incident_id, creation_time ,first_assignment_ts , resolved_ts, assigned_user, severity, time_to_assign , resolve_comment, incident_id
| filter time_to_assign != 0
| sort desc incident_id 
| fields time_to_assign, incident_id, creation_time, first_assignment_ts, assigned_user
| comp avg(time_to_assign) as Average_Time_to_Assign_Minutes
| alter Average_Time_to_Assign_Minutes = round(Average_Time_to_Assign_Minutes)



| view graph type = single subtype = standard header = "Average Time to Assign Today" yaxis = Average_Time_to_Assign_Minutes scale_threshold("#2bfe03","#ffc500","15","#f80202","30") dataunit = "MIN" headerfontsize = 30

config case_sensitive = false
| dataset = incidents 
| filter alert_sources = "CORRELATION" and mitre_techniques_id_and_name = "T1566 - Phishing"
| alter time_to_reslolve = timestamp_diff(resolved_ts , creation_time, "MINUTE")
| fields incident_id, creation_time ,first_assignment_ts , resolved_ts, assigned_user, severity, time_to_reslolve , resolve_comment, incident_id
| filter time_to_reslolve != 0
| sort desc incident_id 
| fields time_to_reslolve, incident_id, creation_time, first_assignment_ts, assigned_user
| comp avg(time_to_reslolve) as Average_Time_to_Resolve_Minutes
| alter Average_Time_to_Assign_Minutes = round(Average_Time_to_Resolve_Minutes)

| view graph type = single subtype = standard header = "Average Time to Resolve Today" yaxis = Average_Time_to_Resolve_Minutes scale_threshold("#2bfe03","#ffc500","15","#f80202","30") dataunit = "MIN" headerfontsize = 30

dataset = alerts 
| filter resolution_status in (ENUM.NEW, ENUM.UNDER_INVESTIGATION ) and alert_source = "CORRELATION" and rule_id = "12" and alert_type = "Phishing"
| fields alert_id, _time, severity, email_sender, alert_name, description
| sort asc _time

dataset = alerts 
| filter resolution_status in (ENUM.NEW, ENUM.UNDER_INVESTIGATION ) and alert_source = "CORRELATION" and rule_id = "12" and alert_type = "Phishing"
| alter Reported_By = email_sender 
| fields alert_id, _time, severity, Reported_By, alert_name, description
| sort asc _time

widgets_data.title: JC - Phishing Average Time to Assign

data.phrase:
config case_sensitive = false
| dataset = incidents 
| filter alert_sources = "CORRELATION" and mitre_techniques_id_and_name = "T1566 - Phishing"
| alter time_to_assign = timestamp_diff(first_assignment_ts, creation_time, "MINUTE")
| fields incident_id, creation_time ,first_assignment_ts , resolved_ts, assigned_user, severity, time_to_assign , resolve_comment, incident_id
| filter time_to_assign != 0
| sort desc incident_id 
| fields time_to_assign, incident_id, creation_time, first_assignment_ts, assigned_user
| comp avg(time_to_assign) as Average_Time_to_Assign_Minutes
| alter Average_Time_to_Assign_Minutes = round(Average_Time_to_Assign_Minutes)




| view graph type = single subtype = standard header = "Average Time to Assign Today" yaxis = Average_Time_to_Assign_Minutes scale_threshold("#2bfe03","#ffc500","15","#f80202","30") dataunit = "MIN" headerfontsize = 30

widgets_data.title: JC - Phishing Average Time to Resolve

data.phrase:
config case_sensitive = false
| dataset = incidents 
| filter alert_sources = "CORRELATION" and mitre_techniques_id_and_name = "T1566 - Phishing"
| alter time_to_reslolve = timestamp_diff(resolved_ts , creation_time, "MINUTE")
| fields incident_id, creation_time ,first_assignment_ts , resolved_ts, assigned_user, severity, time_to_reslolve , resolve_comment, incident_id
| filter time_to_reslolve != 0
| sort desc incident_id 
| fields time_to_reslolve, incident_id, creation_time, first_assignment_ts, assigned_user
| comp avg(time_to_reslolve) as Average_Time_to_Resolve_Minutes
| alter Average_Time_to_Assign_Minutes = round(Average_Time_to_Resolve_Minutes)

| view graph type = single subtype = standard header = "Average Time to Resolve Today" yaxis = Average_Time_to_Resolve_Minutes scale_threshold("#2bfe03","#ffc500","15","#f80202","30") dataunit = "MIN" headerfontsize = 20

config case_sensitive = false
| dataset = incidents 
| filter alert_sources = "CORRELATION" and mitre_techniques_id_and_name = "T1566 - Phishing"
| arrayexpand alert_sources
| fields incident_id, creation_time, resolved_ts, assigned_user , alert_sources as Type , status
| filter status  in (ENUM.NEW, ENUM.UNDER_INVESTIGATION ) 
| comp count_distinct(incident_id) as Incidents by assigned_user

| view graph type = pie xaxis = assigned_user yaxis = Incidents
